verses.text: \w Then|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ephraim \w assembled|strong="H6817"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Jordan \w to|strong="H3212"\w* Zaphon. \w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w calling|strong="H7121"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*? We \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w down|strong="H8313"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w inside|strong="H1004"\w*!”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* replied, “\w My|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* serious \w conflict|strong="H7379"\w* \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w called|strong="H2199"\w*, \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w me|strong="H3467"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* risked \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w then|strong="H2088"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*?”

\w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* \w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w and|strong="H4519"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* Ephraim. \w And|strong="H4519"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Ephraimites \w had|strong="H3588"\w* said, “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w Gileadites|strong="H1568"\w* are \w fugitives|strong="H6412"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* Ephraim, \w living|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* territories \w of|strong="H8432"\w* Ephraim \w and|strong="H4519"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w Gileadites|strong="H1568"\w* \w captured|strong="H3920"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fords|strong="H4569"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* leading \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Ephraim, \w and|strong="H1568"\w* \w whenever|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fugitive|strong="H6412"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* Ephraim \w would|strong="H1568"\w* say, “\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H5674"\w* \w cross|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w*,” \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Gileadites|strong="H1568"\w* \w would|strong="H1568"\w* ask \w him|strong="H3588"\w*, “\w Are|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* Ephraimite?” \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* answered, “\w No|strong="H3808"\w*,”

\w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w* \w Shibboleth|strong="H7641"\w*.” \w If|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Sibboleth|strong="H5451"\w*,” \w because|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w could|strong="H3559"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pronounce|strong="H1696"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w correctly|strong="H3651"\w*, \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w seized|strong="H5307"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H8147"\w* \w killed|strong="H7819"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w at|strong="H3383"\w* \w the|strong="H7819"\w* \w fords|strong="H4569"\w* \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w the|strong="H7819"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*. \w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w at|strong="H3383"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* 42,000 Ephraimites \w were|strong="H8147"\w* \w killed|strong="H7819"\w*.

\w Jephthah|strong="H3316"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w when|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H8141"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w he|strong="H8141"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w one|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*.\f + \fr 12:7 \ft LXX in his city in Gilead\f* Ibzan, Elon, and Abdon
After Jephthah, \w Ibzan|strong="H8199"\w* \w of|strong="H8199"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* well \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* whom \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w gave|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* marriage \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* clan; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w brought|strong="H3478"\w* back \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* wives \w from|strong="H4480"\w* elsewhere. \w Ibzan|strong="H8199"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.
\w Then|strong="H4191"\w* Ibzan \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H4191"\w* \w he|strong="H6912"\w* was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w*.

\w After|strong="H8141"\w* \w Ibzan|strong="H8199"\w*, Elon \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w Zebulunite|strong="H2075"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4191"\w* Elon \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w Zebulunite|strong="H2075"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H4191"\w* \w he|strong="H2074"\w* was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* Aijalon \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* land \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*.

After Elon, \w Abdon|strong="H5658"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hillel|strong="H1985"\w*, \w from|strong="H3478"\w* Pirathon, \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* forty \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w grandsons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w rode|strong="H7392"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H5895"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1121"\w* \w Abdon|strong="H5658"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hillel|strong="H1985"\w*, \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Pirathon|strong="H6552"\w*, \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w at|strong="H4191"\w* \w Pirathon|strong="H6552"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* Ephraim, \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w Amalekites|strong="H6003"\w*.
